title: Very quick quickstart
author: Deborah

readme:
Want to learn the basics of n8n? Our comprehensive [quick quickstart](https://docs.n8n.io/try-it-out/quickstart/) tutorial is here to guide you through the basics of n8n, step by step.

Designed with beginners in mind, this tutorial provides a hands-on approach to learning n8n's basic functionalities.
readme_zh:
想学习n8n的基础知识？我们精心打造的[快速入门指南](https://docs.n8n.io/try-it-out/quickstart/)将循序渐进地带您掌握n8n核心要领。

本教程专为初学者设计，通过实践操作带您领略n8n的基础功能。
